text: Hi.  Have you heard of Save the Children
no i have not tell me about and what makes tyhem special?
they help children all over the world, including the US.  They help them with education, medical treatment, food
where does the money go for the children directly or to their schools?
neither.  it's a charity that provides resources for the children.  would you like to donate $1 today
well i need more information like how long have they been helping children and  which parts of the US do they help?
I'm really not sure how long they have been helping.  they help children over all parts of the US
how would my dollar be divided if I was to donate? like which amount will go where can I choose?
88% of donations goes towards programs and services.  as an individual donor you can choose a child to sponsor
that sounds like a good idea could i get to write to the child or talk to them?
yes, you would be given a welcome kit which would include a photo and contact info on the child
what else would be done to help the children? will there be a way to video chat with them?
you can't video chat with them but you would receive video updates on how they are doing.  Would you like to donate $1 today
i would probably liek to donate less than that maybe about 25 cents since I am not familiar with the organization.
Great.  ANy amount will help.  THanks
no problem hope that it can go to a good cause to see it benefit from it at all.
So good of you. I hopemore people contribute
yea me too . since it would help kids but I feel they would need more infomation so they feel it is legit
Thanks for your donation
no problem thanks for explaining to me about it and going in depth a bit to answer questions that I have had.
